Text: Forgot to mention, that after installation, the WPI Wizard will pop up. There you can choose from a list of apps, which ones you want to be installed by the WPI Wizard.

Guess you choose the wrong language to be installed during setup. Not my fault.

You get the option to choose several languages to be installed during setup. Seems you choose Dutch.

Install again or download a languagepack from Windows Update.
